location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Plan of empty land situated at Qadhibia (outskirt of Manama), Harbour of Bahrain, which has been sold by the Government of Bahrain to the Government of Great Britain'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: sketched on paperDimensions: 405 x 304 mm

mods.abstract: The sketch shows the site situated at Qadhibia (outskirts of Manama), Harbour of Bahrain, proposed for lease by the Government of Bahrain to the Government of Great Britain. The sketch represents in blue and red pencil the sea-shore and the estates and lands surrounding the site, indicating their owners.
